title: Congratulations are in order...
content:
Congratulations to [Miguel Sousa](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808124354/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Miguel%252BSousa) for the recent appointment to the [font devewlopment position](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808124354/http:/blogs.adobe.com/typblography/2006/01/job_opening_fon.html) at [Adobe](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808124354/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Adobe). It couldn’t have happened to a better candidate, IMO. Miguel is one of the most knowledgeable and helpful contributers here at typophile, and I’m sure I’m not the only one who appreciates that. I figured since he’s now in [San Jose](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808124354/http:/typophile.com/wiki/San%252BJose), it’s safe to break the news. Let’s get a big round of applause, everyone!

 [‹ Kudos to Kris Sowersby](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808124354/http:/typophile.com/node/19684 "Go to previous forum topic") [Zero in Garamond Premier Pro ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070808124354/http:/typophile.com/node/19212 "Go to next forum topic")
author: paul d hunt
